document_data.name: ''Ring of Naga's Kiss''
document_data.mainbody:
The '''''ring of naga's kiss''''' was the [[ring]] magically-created using ''[[naga blood]]'' in [[1369 DR]].

{{quote|''Behold Fountain Macabre. Drown me in the blood of Nagakind and receive the Naga's Kiss.''|Inscription on the ''Fountain Macabre''}}
document_data.Description: The ''ring of naga's kiss'' was a metal circle decorated with a serpentine design that was reminiscent of [[naga]] scales.
document_data.Powers: The ''ring of naga's kiss'' was created to be wielded by a [[fighter]] and granted the wearer significantly increased protection and improved constitution.
document_data.History: In 1369 DR, the heroes from [[Phlan]] seeking to gain entrance to [[Castle Cormanthor]] via [[Dwarven Dungeons]] found one of many magical fountains corrupted by the evil influence in the ruins. The ''Fountain Macabre'' asked vials of ''naga blood'' when poured, the blood congealed, and formed into the serpentine ''ring of naga's kiss''.
